snippet.title: The Zium Exposition | Announcement Trailer | Release: 11.11.24
snippet.description:
https://theziumsociety.itch.io/the-zium-exposition

The Zium Exposition is a Museum Exploration Game filled with artwork and installations from artists around the world, working in various mediums and styles.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

High in the Zwitz Alps, visit the foundational Zwitzerland Okkozium; the central pavilion of The Grand Expo. Ride the Okkozium Exposition Ropeway through the vaulting tunnels of Mount Okkozium, arriving at The Archival Plateau, high above Zwitzerland. There, you will ride the Expo Elevator down towards The Okkozium where 45 artists have assembled to tell the story of 
The Zium Exposition. 

The Zium Exposition is sponsored by the sovereign nations of 
Campano, Lyptch, Lasagna, Sunco, Yerdna and Zwitzerland.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------


Featured Artists:

A. Archival, Nicola Acler, Most Ancient, Pippin Barr, Michael Berto, Louis Brooks, Tea Bähr, Jay Castello, Pol Clarissou, James Crossley, cdbunker2, chantako, colorfiction, deuveir, Bob Doucette. Eqüietum. Joost Eggermont, Christopher Ferris, Farfama, Freya Holmér, Luis Hernandez, Grigory Kurosu, Maria Lamanna, Paul Lancelot, Leonard Lemaitre, Sirius Lemaitre, Niki Long, Charlotte Madelon, Nomi, Lur Noise, Greg Nunn, Jacob Potterfield, Horatiu Roman, Pietro Righi Riva, Ninn Salaün, nousesko, Kylin Ali Snowden, Quinn Spence, Ellis Tolsma, Tzschk, Ygor Dimas, Richard Walsh,  Zilasaule and Tu Zishi.


Development Team:

Creative Director, Lead Developer, Curator, Founder: Michael Berto
Architectural Art Direction, Level Design: Leonard Lemaitre
Programming and UX: Sirius Lemaitre
Graphic Design and Gallery Asset Art Direction: Louis Brooks
Classical Zium Modular Assets: Quinn Spence
The Grand Expo Tourism Posters: Nomi
Introductory Sequence: Jacob Potterfield


-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Every artist involved with The Zium Exposition was a gracious tester and collaborator throughout the process. The work on display belongs to the artists who created and submitted the pieces, for collection and display, humbly with The Zium Project.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Zium Exposition
welcomes visitors
11-11-2024

www.thezium.art

https://theziumsociety.itch.io/the-zium-exposition

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

website: www.thezium.art
social media:  @thezium
